block.p: Marcy Sykes Pritchard, a daughter of Barbara McGinnis Pritchard of Auburn, Ala., and Craig L. Pritchard of Worcester, Mass., is to be married today to J. Brett Shablak, the son of Nancy and Scott Shablak of Fayetteville, N.Y. The Rev. John J. Behnke, a Roman Catholic priest and a cousin of the bridegroom, is to perform the ceremony at St. Thomas Church in Hamilton, N.Y.

The bride, 34, will continue to use her name professionally. She is the line producer for ''Blue's Clues,'' the children's show on Nickelodeon, the cable television network, in Manhattan. She graduated from Tufts University. Her mother, who is retired, was a nurse's assistant at the Wesley Terrace Retirement Home in Auburn. The bride's father retired as the director of corporate and foundation relations at Clark University in Worcester.

Marcy Sykes Pritchard, a daughter of Barbara McGinnis Pritchard of Auburn, Ala., and Craig L. Pritchard of Worcester, Mass., is to be married today to J. Brett Shablak, the son of Nancy and Scott Shablak of Fayetteville, N.Y. The Rev. John J. Behnke, a Roman Catholic priest and a cousin of the bridegroom, is to perform the ceremony at St. Thomas Church in Hamilton, N.Y.

The bride, 34, will continue to use her name professionally. She is the line producer for ''Blue's Clues,'' the children's show on Nickelodeon, the cable television network, in Manhattan. She graduated from Tufts University. Her mother, who is retired, was a nurse's assistant at the Wesley Terrace Retirement Home in Auburn. The bride's father retired as the director of corporate and foundation relations at Clark University in Worcester.

The bridegroom, 27, is a special education teacher at Community School 214 in the Bronx and a participant in the New York City Teaching Fellows program, in which people from fields other than teaching are recruited to work in the city's failing schools. Until July, he was a manager of distributor relations at Miramax Films in Manhattan. He graduated from Syracuse University, where his father is the assistant dean of the school of education. The bridegroom's mother teaches the first grade at the Lake Street School in Chittenango, N.Y.
